overview:
Mike Strambi brings more than 20 years of corporate finance experience to his role as CFO of Metacafe, where he is focused on helping advance Metacafeâ€™s mission to build a leading global media company focused on short-form video entertainment powered and programmed by its audience.

Mike most recently served as vice president of finance for MobiTV. Prior, he held similar titles at both Macromedia for four years and at Blue Martini Software for two. He served as vice president, controller and treasurer, for Sun-Diamond Growers of California for 10 years, after starting his career as an audit manager for Ernst & Young. A Certified Public Accountant, Mike earned his MBA from the University of Southern California, and holds a bachelorâ€™s degree from California State University, Sacramento.
